While obsession is a great tool for becoming really good at something, let's not forget that it can sometimes divert you from achieving true happiness. Thomas Flight has a great video essay comparing the obsession with excellence from The Bear and the contentment with simplicity from Perfect Days. He explains this idea better than I could.
